reviewText:
Excellent delivery!!! 2 weeks earlier from the scheduled arrival! The booklet looks nice, I wasn't expecting anything else from it! The dvd and the cd are top quality!
Only one issue though - there are 2 official videoclips on the dvd(besides the concerts) but are inversed e.g.: lion of knowledge instead of art of endless creation and viceversa! But this is still a long-awaited dvd from one of the best death metal bands in Poland, maybe in the world!
5 stars, no question about it!
